name: Hot Heat Reset: Chapter 1
description:
Hot Heat Reset: Chapter 1 is the first chapter of the game, Hot Heat Reset, which is a maze action game where you play as an unknown speedster hiding under a skull who is in pursuit to recover his stolen lands where an explosives factory is under operation.



Progress through different levels laid across different chapters and unlock new deployable elements and new playable characters along the way.





  • Large explorable level layouts
  • Fast paced grid based movement
  • Dozens of deployable elements
  • Dozens of playable characters
  • LOTS OF EXPLOSIONS!
